content:
Fun-Filled Key West Attractions Await


There are cocktails to be sipped, delicious food to be enjoyed, and iconic Key West attractions to see first hand. This is your island adventure -- make the most of it.

Whether your main goal is to relax under the sun or frolic in the waves, Key West activities are plentiful and diverse. From watersports galore to shopping bliss, there is so much to do and see, one trip might not be enough. Peruse our Key West vacation guide to learn more about what you can expect from the surrounding area.

To book your off-site excursion, please email themarkerresort@keywestconcierge.org
